reviews.review: хорошая игра,но если вы хотите на нынешнее время адекватно играть за выживших вам нужно собрать пати,однообразие игры тоже начинает со временем душить,обновления довольно частые что держит эту игру на играбельном уровне,но жаль что другие режимы отсуствуют и вряд ли подумывают их добавлять.

This ol' goat been playin' Dead By Daylight fer more than a week now, an' ah can tell yall it's a whole lotta fun...BUT...it do gots a learnin' curve.  You ain't gon' dive in 'n be a gamer gawd right off th' bat.  You gon' die, 'n die, 'n die, 'n die, 'n then lookee there you done escaped but got nuthin' fer points!!  I'm gettin' much better at it now that I'm gettin' the camera movement down, so I been using them player perks to make them killers go wild!  Killers gone wild!  heh heh yeh but they's gotta catch this goat first!

It's a fun game but you can't take it too seriously. There are random elements like the types of items/add-ons your teammates/opponents might bring to the match and also the maps are randomized (they never look exactly the same each time). So if you get tilted when the playing field isn't 100% even, you're going to have a bad time. If you just want to chill and play for fun, this game is great. There's a bit of a learning curve if you want to "play well" but you can get by as a beginner no problem. Very unique gameplay and super addictive.
